source: arxiv-physics dataset (Tang et al., 2024). GitHub: https://github.com/PKUTHM/arxiv-physics
description: A large-scale relational dataset curated from arXiv Physics domain (2018-2023). Contains 222,769 papers, 143,691 authors, 53 physics categories, and 1.5M citations. Structured as a normalized relational database for Relational Deep Learning.

papers.description: Core paper metadata including title, abstract, submission date, DOI, and primary category assignment.

columns.Title: Paper title
columns.Primary_Category_ID: FK to categories.Category_ID â€” the paper's primary physics research area

categories.description: Taxonomy of 53 physics research areas used for classification.

columns.Category_ID: Internal category identifier (primary key, FK target from papers.Primary_Category_ID)
columns.Category: Integer label representing the physics category

authors.description: Unique researchers with optional ORCID identifiers.

paperAuthors.description: Many-to-many mapping between papers and authors (616,585 relationships).

citations.description: Directed citation links (over 1.5M) verified via Crossref API.

paperCategories.description: Secondary category assignments for papers (a paper may belong to multiple physics subfields).
